mapper.insert: insert into org_role (Role_Name, Role_Desc, Sort_number, creater, created, modified) values (#{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select:
select id, Role_Name, Role_Desc, Sort_number, creater, created, modified from org_role where 1 = 1
and ( Role_Name like '%${searchStr}%' or Role_Desc like '%${searchStr}%' )
order by Sort_number

select id, Role_Name, Role_Desc, Sort_number, creater, created, modified from org_role where 1 = 1
and ( Role_Name like concat(#{keyword},'%') or Role_Desc like concat(#{keyword},'%') )
order by Sort_number
select fk_role from org_user_role where userid=#{userId}
